title: Create Neon Genesis sustainable ideas sharing platform

requirements.text: Implement user authentication using Internet Identity to allow users to sign up and log in

quotes: everyone can share and explore ideas

acceptanceCriteria: Users can authenticate using Internet Identity
User sessions persist across page reloads
Authenticated users can access posting and interaction features

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for ideas/posts that includes title, description, category (environmental, disaster-related, or sustainable infrastructure/business), author identity, creation timestamp, and virtual prototype information

quotes: share and explore ideas regarding environmental, disaster related or any sustainable infrastructure or business solutions

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores idea posts with all required fields
Each post is associated with the creator's principal ID
Categories are enforced to be one of: environmental, disaster-related, or sustainable infrastructure/business

requirements.text: Build a post creation interface where authenticated users can create and submit new ideas with title, description, category selection, and virtual prototype content

quotes: they can create virtual prototypes and post it in the website easily

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes fields for title, description, and category dropdown
Virtual prototype can be added as text description or image upload
Posts are successfully submitted to the backend
Form validation ensures all required fields are filled

requirements.text: Implement a feed view displaying all posted ideas in an Instagram-like card layout with infinite scroll or pagination

quotes: everyone can share and explore ideas
make this app attractive and usable like Instagram

acceptanceCriteria: Ideas are displayed in a responsive card grid layout
Each card shows title, author, category tag, and preview of description
Feed loads additional posts as user scrolls
Visual design is modern and Instagram-inspired

requirements.text: Add filtering capability to the feed allowing users to filter ideas by category (environmental, disaster-related, sustainable infrastructure/business)

quotes: explore ideas regarding environmental, disaster related or any sustainable infrastructure or business solutions

acceptanceCriteria: Filter buttons or dropdown for each category is visible on the feed page
Selecting a filter shows only posts matching that category
Users can clear filters to see all posts
Backend query supports category filtering

requirements.text: Implement a like system where authenticated users can like posts, with like counts displayed on each post and users able to unlike posts they previously liked

quotes: everyone can like and comment on the posts

acceptanceCriteria: Each post displays a like button and current like count
Users can toggle like/unlike on posts
Backend tracks which users liked which posts
Like count updates in real-time after user interaction

requirements.text: Build a commenting system where authenticated users can add text comments to posts and view all comments on a post

quotes: everyone can like and comment on the posts

acceptanceCriteria: Each post has a comment section showing all comments
Authenticated users can submit new comments
Comments display author identity and timestamp
Comments are stored in backend and retrieved per post

requirements.text: Create a three-tier investment rating system where users can rate posts with diamond (100-300 dollars), blue sapphire (300-500 dollars), or red ruby (500-700 dollars) badges indicating their willingness to invest, with aggregate rating counts displayed on each post

quotes: rating system on each post for example diamond, blue sapphire and red ruby stone each signifying the money range people want to or willing to invest
diamond being for instance 100-300 dollars, blue stone 300-500 dollars and red stone 500-700 dollars

acceptanceCriteria: Each post displays three rating buttons: diamond (100-300), blue sapphire (300-500), red ruby (500-700)
Users can select one rating tier per post
Backend stores user ratings and calculates aggregate counts per tier
Each post shows count of how many users selected each investment tier
Rating buttons are visually distinct with gem/stone icons

requirements.text: Design and implement an attractive Instagram-inspired visual theme with vibrant neon accents, modern typography, card-based layouts, smooth animations, and a cohesive color scheme that emphasizes sustainability and innovation

quotes: make this app attractive and usable like Instagram

acceptanceCriteria: UI uses modern, clean design with neon accent colors reflecting the 'Neon Genesis' branding
Typography is legible and contemporary
Card layouts are visually appealing with consistent spacing and borders
Hover and click interactions include smooth transitions
Overall aesthetic is cohesive across all pages and components

requirements.text: Render generated hero banner image and gem/stone rating icons as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Generated hero banner is displayed prominently on the landing or feed page
Diamond, blue sapphire, and red ruby rating icons are used in the investment rating UI
Images are loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated directory

constraints: Use Internet Identity for all authentication, no third-party auth providers
All backend logic must reside in a single Motoko actor file
Frontend must use React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and React Query
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Actual payment processing or financial transactions
Mobile app versions (React Native or Flutter)

required: Hero banner with vibrant neon lights and abstract sustainable/environmental theme featuring greens, electric blues, and neon accents (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Diamond gem icon with transparent background, sparkling white/silver diamond suitable for investment rating button (diamond-icon.dim_64x64.png)
Blue sapphire gem icon with transparent background, deep blue sapphire suitable for investment rating button (blue-sapphire-icon.dim_64x64.png)
Red ruby gem icon with transparent background, vibrant red ruby suitable for investment rating button (red-ruby-icon.dim_64x64.png)
